solution_line_template: Sarith would run around the adult football field, {kristin_laps} laps / {speed_multiplier} = <<{kristin_laps}/{speed_multiplier}={sarith_equivalent_laps_adult_field}>>{sarith_equivalent_laps_adult_field} laps.

So on the children's football field, she managed to run, {sarith_equivalent_laps_adult_field} laps * {field_distance_ratio} = <<{sarith_equivalent_laps_adult_field}*{field_distance_ratio}={sarith_laps_children_field}>>{sarith_laps_children_field} laps.
